title: What are the fees for Byju’s with online classes for standard 8th and 9th? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are two different programs that Byju’s run first one is Tablet Learning Program (TLP) where as the other one is Byju’s Classes ( TLP + Online Classes).First program costs 50k + Tablet price as per online pricing whereas the second one will cost you around 90k + Tablet price.If you get enrolled via Byju’s internal team you may get certain discount over the program approximately 40%.For any more queries feel free to get in touch on 7503808327.

Depends upon the counsellor from whom you buy the product and BNAT performance….for 2 year NEET preparation,it costs about 1,35,000 to 1,50,000 depending on the Tab you select…so you can getan ide for class 8 and 9…it must be around 70,000…but I dont know actual price so it may vary…Do appear in BNAT for assured 20% scholarship…I got 90 percent scholarship on my purchse …My All India Percentile was 98.4…. please upvote if it helped
